results.content: I have taken several courses from Data is Good, and have never been disappointed. This course is paced well with a very clear delivery that keeps my attention and focus which is very important for knowledge retention. I consider myself a beginner when it comes to Java Script, but I feel this course is moving me in toward being confident and competent using Java Script.
